creator: Quentin Fottrell
title: Our two daughters are struggling with student debt. Should we dip into our $1.8 million 401(k)s to buy them apartments?
dc:creator: Quentin Fottrell
content: “Each apartment would be priced close to $225,000.”
contentSnippet: “Each apartment would be priced close to $225,000.”

creator: Quentin Fottrell
title: I received an inheritance from my father’s estate, but the executor wants me to give it back. What should I do?
dc:creator: Quentin Fottrell
content: “The attorney for my late father stated that all beneficiaries needed to wait 10 months before disbursements from the sale of the home could be released.”
contentSnippet: “The attorney for my late father stated that all beneficiaries needed to wait 10 months before disbursements from the sale of the home could be released.”
